search_information.query_displayed: From Idealism to Pragmatic Detachment: The Academic Performance of College Athletes. Adler, Peter Adler, Patricia A. Sociology of Education

organic_results.title: FROM IDEALISM TO PRAGMATIC DETACHMENT
organic_results.snippet: This study examines the relationship between athletic participation and academic performance aming athletes involved in big-time college sports. Drawing on four years of participant observation of a major college basketball program, we trace athletes' involvement in academics throughout their college careers. We show that, contrary to popular belief, most athletes enter college with optimistic and idealistic goals and attitudes about their impending academic careers. However, their athletic, social, and classroom …

publication_info.summary: P Adler, PA Adler - Sport, 2003 - books.google.com

organic_results.title: From idealism to pragmatic detachment: The academic performance of college athletes
organic_results.snippet: This study examines the relationship between athletic participation and academic performance among athletes involved in big-time college sports. Drawing on four years of participant observation of a major college basketball program, we trace athletes' involvement in academics throughout their college careers. We show that, contrary to popular belief, most athletes enter college with optimistic and idealistic goals and attitudes about their impending academic careers. However, their athletic, social, and classroom …
